history.proof: intros a b H1 H2. unfold Rmax. hauto use: Rplus_comm, Rplus_0_r, Rplus_le_compat, Req_le inv: sumbool.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : R H1 : 0 <= a H2 : 0 <= b r : a <= b Unable to unify "Rmax ?M2289 ?M2291 < Rmax ?M2290 ?M2292 \\/ Rmax ?M2289 ?M2291 = Rmax ?M2290 ?M2292" with "b < a + b \\/ b = a + b".
In environment a, b : R H1 : 0 <= a H2 : 0 <= b r : a <= b Unable to unify "0 <= a" with "b <= a + b".
In environment a, b : R H1 : 0 <= a H2 : 0 <= b r : a <= b Unable to unify "0 <= b" with "b <= a + b".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment a, b : R H1 : 0 <= a H2 : 0 <= b n : ~ a <= b Unable to unify "0 < ?M2289 + ?M2290 \\/ 0 = ?M2289 + ?M2290" with "a < a + b \\/ a = a + b".

original: intros a b H1 H2. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec a b). - apply Rmax_le_compat. + apply H1. + apply H2. - apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat. + apply Rle_0_plus. + apply Rle_0_plus.
